https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/343gVtbOIVPjGvyv4FlMr22TWNd.jpg The first story of a former detective and current private inspector. Hye-sook and Yoo-jin are a lesbian couple that love each other. One day, Hye-sook finds out Yoo-jin is seeing another man and warns the man to stay away.However, the man ends up threatening her for her life. Hye-sook wants Yoo-jin back so she seeks a private eye, but a few days later, she goes off grid. The private suspects sheâ€™s been kidnapped and finds Yoo-jin to find out the whereabouts of Hye-sook. Bad Detective: Reload
